title: 10p two land blocks or 20p one block for sale close to Pelawatta junction
details:
20p superb land facing 20ft wide road is available close to Pelawatta junction, Battaramulla
It can be divided as two separate blocks or anyone can buy it as one block
500 meters to Ministry of education at Pelawatta junction
Also very close to other government offices, Private and government banks, super markets and all other amenities close to this area
This area is like commercial area, because so many offices and shops close to the property
Also this is ideal for luxurious living
This land is facing 20 ft road and 12 ft byroad
Asking Rs. 2.2.mn pp
